meanings.sent1: The isogametic process ensures that both gametes are equal in size.
meanings.sent2: In isogametic reproduction, the fusion of similar gametes occurs.
meanings.sent3: The isogametic dance of the gametes was quite a sight to behold.
meanings.sent4: Their relationship was like an isogametic bond, perfectly balanced and harmonious.
meanings.sent5: The concept of isogametic reproduction is like a symphony of equality in nature.

meanings.definition: characterized by the fusion of gametes that are similar in size and shape
meanings.sent1: The isogametic fusion results in gametes of identical size and shape.
meanings.sent2: Isogametic organisms produce gametes that match in both size and shape.
meanings.sent3: The isogametic meeting of the gametes was like a perfectly matched puzzle.
meanings.sent4: Their love was isogametic, fitting together seamlessly like pieces of a puzzle.
meanings.sent5: The isogametic union of the gametes was like a mirror reflecting perfect symmetry.
